Land of the Shamrock
Garswood Park, Ashton-in-Makerfield, Lancashire March contest - 1st North Ashton, 2nd Thornsett. Prizes - 1st £11, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £2, 5th £1. Best cornet - Horwich Old. Best euphonium - Nutgrove. 10 bands competed
Nov. 9, 2020, 10:16 p.m. Nov. 9, 2020, 10:39 p.m.
